The release introduces some improvements to the grid’s stability, new features, and testnet resource additions. You can read more within!

Sam Taggart

20 November 2020

ThreeFold Grid 2.3 is LIVE on mainnet!

The release introduces some improvements to the grid’s stability, new features, and testnet resource additions.

Read the TF Grid 2.3 official release note for more info.

Many thanks to the development team who made this release happen! 👏
